entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
